duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and monitor facility mechanical plant, report malfunctions, and provide support during preventive maintenance of electro/mechanical systems.
Perform preventive maintenance on fitness equipment, pool, and spas, oversee outside maintenance and cleaning service contractors, and make minor repairs.
Coordinate with outside vendors for major repairs, including plumbing, electrical, and mechanical systems, and perform architectural repairs.
Conduct general maintenance duties, ensure safety in the centers, and provide emergency support as needed.
Order maintenance supplies, report policy violations, and meet timelines and deadlines for supporting systems and employee compliance.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED Equivalent, 5 years of commercial experience in building systems operations, including swimming pools, basic computer skills, clear driving record, and valid Texas Driver’s License.
